task.title: Now lets pull our source from GitHub!
task.shortdesc: What we're going to do: You can reate a new Jenkins Job, or modify the one you already have and configure it to pull the source from GitHub.

step.cmd: On the Source Code Management tab of the job, select Git.
Paste the URL to your fork of the doc/demo repo, like this:
Make sure that Branches to build contains */master.
Modify the dita command you used in the Windows CLI and Jenkins job, and save the job configuration.
step.stepresult: Your out folder and pdf file will be generated in the Jenkins workspace.
